name: Pretty Good Solitaire Mini
description:
Pretty Good Solitaire is the premier solitaire game collection with 720 different solitaire card games (plus 70 bonus games, for a total of 790 games).

Since 1995, Pretty Good Solitaire has been the choice of millions of solitaire players at Goodsol.com!

Includes the popular games Klondike, FreeCell, Spider, Yukon, Scorpion, Pyramid, Cruel and more.

Also includes many games invented for Pretty Good Solitaire, such as Demons and Thieves and Aces and Kings.

Features:

- Easy to play: just drag the cards or tap them to move them quickly.

- Beautiful cards: designed to look like real cards but be easy to see. Use the special large suit card set or choose one of our other regular card sets.

- Full Undo and Redo: undo any move or all your moves, and redo them.

- Automatic Game Saving: saves your games when you leave and you can continue playing when you return.

- AutoPlay/QuickMove: option can automatically play cards to the foundations for you.

- Dynamic Card Sizing: pinch to make the cards smaller or spread to make them bigger. It automatically adjusts card size for portrait or landscape.

- Tap and hold on a pile to get more information about what cards can be played there.

- Tap the game name button to do a new game, play the next game number, or see your statistics.

- Tap the Rules button to see the rules of each game.

- Over 2 billion starting positions for each game. Game numbers compatible with the Mac and iPad versions.

- Statistics for multiple players.

Pretty Good Solitaire is the solitaire game for players who take solitaire seriously!
